text: mariyu niyamita rojulalo allah nu smarincandi. Evadaina tvaraga rendu rojulalone vellipoyina, atanipai elanti dosam ledu. Marevadaina nidaninci (padamudava tedi varaku) nilici poyina, atanipai elanti dosam ledu, vadiki, evadaite daivabhiti kaligi untado! Mariyu allah yandu bhayabhaktulu kaligi undandi. Mariyu niscayanga miranta ayana sannidhilo hajaru ceyabadutaranedi telusukondi
